类 GameLabyrinth

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.GameController
      • main.GameLabyrinth
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class GameLabyrinth
extends GameController
    Characterizing an individual labyrinth.
    版本:
    Final
    作者:
    BAO Yukun

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GameLabyrinth

        public GameLabyrinth(MainApp mainApp,
                     java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String fileAdd,
                     java.lang.String fileTempAdd,
                     int gameWidth,
                     int gameHeight,
                     int blockWidth,
                     int blockHeight)
        The constructor.
        参数:
        mainApp - Keep the reference of its generator.
        name - The name of application.
        fileAdd - The file address in which labyrinth is saved.
        fileTempAdd - The cache file address in which labyrinth is saved.
        gameWidth - The labyrinth width in blocks.
        gameHeight - The labyrinth height in blocks.
        blockWidth - The width in pixels of a block.
        blockHeight - The height in pixels of a block.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initGameView

        private final void initGameView(MBox[][] boxes)
        Initialize the labyrinth view at the first start.
        参数:
        boxes - The abstract format of the labyrinth.

      • setBoxColor

        private final void setBoxColor(MBox objBox,
                               byte objcolor)
        Change the attribution of a certain box.
        参数:
        objBox - The reference of the box to be changed.
        objcolor - The desiring color for the box.

      • drawNewPath

        private final void drawNewPath()
        Display the shortest path on the screen.

      • clearOldPath

        private final void clearOldPath()
        Clear the displaying of old path.

      • modifyBoxColor

        private final boolean modifyBoxColor(int boxH,
                                     int boxW,
                                     byte color)
        Verify the legacy of modifying the attribution of a box.
        参数:
        boxH - The height of the box.
        boxW - The width of the box.
        color - The desiring color for this box.
        返回:
        true if legal, false if not.

      • isFocusInsideLabyrinth

        private final boolean isFocusInsideLabyrinth(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Check if the mouse focus inside the labyrinth.
        参数:
        e - MouseEvent
        返回:
        true if inside the labyrinth, false if not.

      • fillRectangle

        private final void fillRectangle(java.awt.event.MouseEvent start,
                                 java.awt.event.MouseEvent end,
                                 byte color)
        Method for drawing a block of boxes by dragging the mouse.
        参数:
        start - MouseEvent which records the start point of dragging.
        end - MouseEvent which records the end point of dragging.
        color - Which color to be set for this block.

      • initRandomly

        public final void initRandomly()
        Initialize the whole labyrinth by setting walls randomly.

      • resizeLabyrinth

        public final void resizeLabyrinth(int width,
                                  int height)
        Resize the labyrinth.
        参数:
        width - The new width of the labyrinth.
        height - The new height of the labyrinth.

      • saveEmptyLabyrinthToFile

        private final void saveEmptyLabyrinthToFile(java.lang.String fileAdd,
                                            int width,
                                            int height)
        Write abstract format of an empty labyrinth into file.
        参数:
        fileAdd - The file to be found.
        width - The width of the labyrinth.
        height - The height of the labyrinth.

      • openFile

        public final byte openFile(java.lang.String fileAdd)
        Open an existing labyrinth from a file.
        参数:
        fileAdd - The file address where the labyrinth is stored.
        返回:
        The open result: 1 if the format is not a labyrinth; 2 if the labyrinth is too big to display for current screen.

      • isFileFormatLegal

        private final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> isFileFormatLegal(java.lang.String fileAdd)
        Verify if the file is a labyrinth format
        参数:
        fileAdd - The file to be verified.
        返回:
        The coordinate in ArrayList format. If the file cannot be recognized as a labyrinth, return null.

      • saveFile

        public final boolean saveFile()
        Save labyrinth to file.
        返回:
        True if successful, false if not.

      • newFile

        public final void newFile(java.lang.String fileAdd,
                          int width,
                          int height)
        Create a totally different labyrinth and save it in file.
        参数:
        fileAdd - The file to be created for saving the labyrinth.
        width - Width of the new labyrinth.
        height - Height of the new labyrinth.

        public final void mouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Invoked when a mouse button is pressed on a component and then dragged. MOUSE_DRAGGED events will continue to be delivered to the component where the drag originated until the mouse button is released regardless of whether the mouse position is within the bounds of the component.

      • mouseMoved

        public final void mouseMoved(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
        Invoked when the mouse cursor has been moved onto a component but no buttons have been pushed.

      • keyTyped

        public final void keyTyped(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Invoked when a key has been typed. See the class description for KeyEvent for a definition of a key typed event.

      • keyPressed

        public final void keyPressed(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)

      • keyReleased

        public final void keyReleased(java.awt.event.KeyEvent e)
        Invoked when a key has been released. See the class description for KeyEvent for a definition of a key released event.
